errors.emojiError: Para meu funcionamento, preciso da permissão de `[externalEmojis]`. Por favor, solicite para algum administrador que ative isso para que eu possa funcionar :)
errors.linkError: Para meu funcionamento, preciso da permissão de `[sendLinks]`. Por favor, solicite para algum administrador que ative isso para que eu possa funcionar :)
errors.dmError: Sorry, but I can't send direct messages yet :(
errors.commandNotFound: Oops, I couldn't find the command `[command]`. Did you mean something like `[alt]`?

mention.title: Who calls me?
mention.line1: Oh, hello [username], how are you? My name is [me].
mention.line2: Well, if you wanna know my function, it is help your server in many creatives and different ways!
mention.line3: Maybe you don't know my prefix on this server and that's why you called me. If that is your question, it is `[prefix]`.
mention.line4: If you have any suggestion or found any issue, join to my [support server]([url]) to talk with my creator.
mention.line5: If you wanna add me to your server, just click [aqui]([url])!
mention.line6: And finally, thanks for calling me. It was great to explain who I am <3
